casebody.data:
McKenzie
v.
Horne 327P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Mr. Eugene Elliott McKenzie, Pro Se. Mr. Ernie Lee, District Attorney, For State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of August 2016 by Petitioner for Petition for Mandate:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
